```{r include = FALSE}
#Packages
library(tidyverse)
library(downloader)
```

```{r include = FALSE}
#Load Data
csv_data <- tempfile()
download("https://github.com/WJC-Data-Science/DTS350/raw/master/sales.csv", 
csv_data, mode = "wb")
sales_data <- read_csv(csv_data)
```

```{r Convert to Mountain Time}
#Convert to Mountain Time
sales_data <- sales_data %>%
  with_tz(tzone = 'Us/Mountain')
```

```{r Create aggregate times}
#Create aggregate times (daily, weekly, monthly)
sales_data <- sales_data %>%
  mutate(daily = ceiling_date(Time, "day")) %>%
  mutate(weekly = ceiling_date(Time, "week")) %>%
  mutate(monthly = ceiling_date(Time, "month"))
```
